name: AimorFrame(SmartHome)
0:
”Alexa, turn on photo frame”
”Alexa, turn off photo frame”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
1. Apply for AiMOR account
2. Find AiMOR Smart Home Skills in Alexa Skills Store :AiMOR . Use your AiMOR account to log in the associated skills
3. Connected account was successful and device was found successfully
4. Use command statement to control the screen switch of the photo frame device. For example: Alexa,turn on/off name.
